attributes.action: stop trucks and other slow moving vehicles over taking each other on motor ways (and driving at practically the same speed), meaning only the fast lane can be used while they move side by side for what seems like an eternity!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't know if I'm the only one (and I am fully aware there are far more noble causes out there), but I am just sick of trucks and other larger vehicles driving side by side of each other, and the vehicle being over taken refusing to slow down resulting in them blocking the whole road for everyone else. It's small, it's an annoyance but it would be great if it stopped!
